name: BLT
entries: Ingredients: x1 Rare or higher beast meat, x1 rare fae meat, x1 Tornado Tulip, x2 Road Tack
Effect: You gain a +1 bonus to all attack, ability, saving, and damage rolls. In addition, your movement speed increases by 10ft, you gain 10ft of darkvision, and gain 10 Temporary Hit points.

description.chatFlavor: +1 to all rolls, +10ft speed, +10ft darkvision, 10 temp HP.
